Description.Text: The aparthotel is located on Liverpool Street, next to Hyde Park, and is within walking distance of just about everything. The apartments are located amongst everything fantastic Sydney has to offer, with shops, restaurants, cafÃ©s and transport right on the doorstep, and Sydney CBD and city attractions are all within walking distance. Sydney Airport is situated at a distance of approximately 15 km.

The interior of each apartment is a fusion of industrial and contemporary glamour with their large ornate mirrors combined with funky Pirelli rubber stud floors. All furnishings within the apartments are hip contemporary designer pieces. Each apartment is equipped with a hairdryer, direct dial telephone, TV, tea and coffee making facilities, an ironing set, air conditioning and a balcony or terrace.

The stylish apartment hotel is ideal for travellers who appreciate space, style and the convenience of facilities within their individual apartments, but do not require the services of a hotel such as room service, concierge or front desk. Comprising a total of 13 rooms, the property features a lobby, lift access, a hairdressing salon, restaurant and a laundry service.
